full_text:
The Department of Community Services shall consist of a director, who shall be its administrative head, and such other officers and employees as deemed necessary by the Manager and Council and whose salaries shall be fixed by the Council. 
Charter reference: Departments enumerated, §6.1 et seq.

2.name: CHAPTER 1. - THE DEPARTMENT OF COMMUNITY SERVICES
2.label: chapter

2.catch_line: FUNCTIONS AND DUTIES OF THE DEPARTMENT.

plain_text:
CODE OF STATE

DIRECTOR, OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES. (§ 4-1001)

The Department of Community Services shall consist of a director, who shall be
its administrative head, and such other officers and employees as deemed
necessary by the Manager and Council and whose salaries shall be fixed by the
Council. 
Charter reference: Departments enumerated, §6.1 et seq.
